title: Eisenhower34
author: Eisenhower34
content: Currently purchasing Solana or XMR with the following methods at the moment:PaypalWestern UnionPlease contact me via PM with the amount of Solana or XMR you have to sell and the rate you wish to receive.If escrow is used, you pay the fees.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Quote from: Eisenhower34 on November 20, 2023, 10:39:38 PMIf escrow is used, you pay the fees.The old positive feedback you have means nothing. Your post history is questionable, and You are the one who needs the Solana/XMR, so why should the seller bear the escrow fees?  If you receive an offer, I will be damned.Hard Luck.

comments.author: carbone9090
comments.body: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5482291.msg63528571#msg63528571Eisenhower34  you have 24 hours to pay me my money. If you don't do this i will open scam thread against you. I will post all our talk with screenshots on forum. If you don't read my instruction and give me incorrect wallet address its not my problem. I sent you clear instruction in PM..

comments.author: carbone9090
comments.body: Quote from: Eisenhower34 on November 20, 2023, 10:39:38 PMCurrently purchasing Solana or XMR with the following methods at the moment:PaypalWestern UnionPlease contact me via PM with the amount of Solana or XMR you have to sell and the rate you wish to receive.If escrow is used, you pay the fees.Still not get my 200$ SFI back from this scammer!
